summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 4.0°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.2°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 12%) and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 321 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 529 m), and outside temperature (up 3.6°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 320.6m lower than yesterday, 529.3m lower than past week, 450.8m lower than past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 292m minimum and 1476m maximum, with an average of 442.4m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 971.8m and 893.2m.
cloud levels.summary: Expect overcast skies with low cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and slight breezes. Showers, overcast skies with low cloud, and the light is absent. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
